ðŸ“– Summary: The openrouter-bot repository provides a way to quickly deploy a Telegram bot that can communicate with various AI models via the OpenRouter API or local setups like LM Studio. It supports features like model switching and Markdown formatting, offering a streamlined experience for interacting with AI models through Telegram. The project also optimizes the container startup process for faster deployment.
